title: PluginsConfig
description: An instance of the plugin object.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: The prefix to put before the path of each plugin. Can be override by the prefix properties in the plugin engine declaration.

engines.title: Engines
engines.description: List of plugin engines. Each member is an instance of a plugin engine.

instances.title: Instances
instances.description: List of plugin instances. Each member is an instance of a plugin instance.

configurations.title: Configurations
configurations.description: List of plugin configurations. Each member is an instance of a plugin configuration.
